channel.title: Baosen Zhang
channel.description: Baosen Zhang is an Assistant Professor in the Electrical Engineering Department at the University of Washington.

item.title: Paper on Optimal Control of Battery Under Realistic Degradation Mechanisms
item.description:
1. Y. Shi, B. Xu, Y. Tan, and B. Zhang, “Optimal Battery Control Under Cycle Aging Mechanisms,” in Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control, 2017.
    • BibTeX
      • @inproceedings{Shi17c,
  author = {Shi, Y. and Xu, B. and Tan, Y. and Zhang, B.},
  title = {Optimal Battery Control Under Cycle Aging Mechanisms},
  booktitle = {Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control},
  year = {2017},
  link = {https://arxiv.org/abs/1709.05715},
  blog = {2017-09-15}
}
    • Download

item.title: Paper on Using Generative Adversarial Networks for Scenario Generation
item.description:
Scenario generation method using Generative Adversarial Networks, code available here.

  1. Y. Chen, Y. Wang, D. Kirschen, and B. Zhang, “Model-Free Renewables Scenario Generation Using Generative Adversarial Networks,” Submitted to IEEE Transaction on Power Systems, 2017.
    • BibTeX
      • @article{Chen17,
  author = {Chen, Y. and Wang, Y. and Kirschen, D. and Zhang, B.},
  year = {2017},
  title = {Model-Free Renewables Scenario Generation Using Generative Adversarial Networks},
  journal = {Submitted to IEEE Transaction on Power Systems},
  link = {https://arxiv.org/abs/1707.09676},
  arxiv = {yes},
  blog = {2017-09-01}
}
    • Download

item.title: Paper on Using Battery Storage for Multiple Grid Applications in IEEE Transaction on Power Systems
item.description:
1. Y. Shi, B. Xu, D. Wang, and B. Zhang, “Using Battery Storage for Peak Shaving and Frequency Regulation: Joint Optimization for Superlinear Gains,” To Appear in IEEE Transaction on Power Systems, 2017.

item.title: Couple Papers in IEEE Transactions on Smartgrid on Distributed Online Optimization of Demand Response and Behavior of Energy Storage
item.description:
Two papers to appear in IEEE Transactions on Smartgrid

  1. J. E. Contreras-Ocaña, M. A. Ortega-Vazquez, and B. Zhang, “Participation of an Energy Storage Aggregator in Electricity Markets,” To Appear in IEEE Transactions on Smargrid, 2017.
    • BibTeX
      • @article{Contreras-OcanaEtAl2017,
  author = {Contreras-Oca{\~n}a, Jesus E and Ortega-Vazquez, Miguel A and Zhang, Baosen},
  title = {Participation of an Energy Storage Aggregator in Electricity Markets},
  journal = {To Appear in IEEE Transactions on Smargrid},
  year = {2017},
  link = {http://arxiv.org/abs/1511.02201},
  blog = {2017-08-11}
}
    • Download
  2. P. Li, H. Wang, and B. Zhang, “A Distributed Online Pricing Strategy for Demand Response Programs,” To Appear in IEEE Transactions on Smartgrid, 2017.
    • BibTeX
      • @article{Li17,
  author = {Li, P. and Wang, H. and Zhang, B.},
